 2014-00282014-01-28,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  DFATD
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectSpecial Economic Measures (Syria) Permit Authorization Order
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2011-595 of May 24, 2011; and (2) authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue a permit to any person in Canada or any Canadian outside Canada to carry out a specified activity or transaction that is otherwise restricted or prohibited pursuant to the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (SYRIA) REGULATIONS.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0018 Publication Date: 2014-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
